direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods find the index of an object in the map, but 'lastIndexOf' searches from the end.
Both methods involve index-based operations on the map, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods access and manipulate elements based on their index within the map.
Both methods check for the presence of an object in the map, though 'contains' returns a boolean.
Both methods depend on the underlying key set of the map for their operations.
